channel.title: Chat
channel.description: So i just gotten my New command in ::Yell To work.. When i type on public chat there is no icon in infront of name.. but whne i type in ::yell it has a crown of what i put in as. Does anybody know where i can fix it ?

item.title: Chat
item.dc:creator: @Shadow742000 Shadow742000
item.description:
@Shadow742000 wrote:

im confused… so what you are saying is that when you yell, your owner crown appears but when you talk normally it doesnt?

Read full topic
